articles.author: Scott Bailey
articles.title: Australia v Pakistan cricket:Pakistan destroy Australia’s tail to take lead at SCG
articles.description: Australia conceded a first-innings deficit at home for the first time in 15 Tests after collapsing to be all out for 299 against Pakistan at the SCG.
articles.content:
After Australia had lost 3-18 either side of lunch, Marsh and Alex Carey (38) steadied the ship.
Saturday marks six months since Marshs return to the Test side at Headingley, where he blitzed a 102-… [+1888 chars]

articles.title: ‘Terrible’: Pink Test take divides Aussies
articles.description: Claims about how the McGrath Foundation spends money has caused a stir online as cricket players and fans turn Sydney Cricket Ground pink for the annual Jane McGrath Day
articles.content:

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
